title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain Python library ships a first-party Ollama LLM wrapper for building RAG, agents, chains, etc.

title: ollama-js on npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—browser & Node.js support, promise-based.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install with pip and talk to local models in 3 lines.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui (Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama (formerly Ollama WebUI) with chat history, RAG, user auth, themes.

title: jmorganca/ollama-python (community SDK)
summary: Early community Python SDK that became the official ollama package; still useful for reference.

title: ollama-rb Ruby gem
summary: Official Ruby client for Ollama; idiomatic Ruby objects and blocks for streaming.

title: ollama-cli (Go CLI enhancer)
summary: Go-based CLI that wraps ollama with extra sugar: prompts from files, chat sessions, output templating.

title: ollama-copilot (VS Code extension)
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code as inline Copilot replacements with slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack integration
summary: Haystack 2.x integration letting you use Ollama models as generators in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF Q&A, voice chat, function-calling, Docker Compose stacks, GPU tweaks.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection & autoscaling.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that streams Ollama answers into threads; supports custom system prompts and model rotation.

title: ollama4j Java SDK
summary: Idiomatic Java 17+ client with CompletableFuture streaming, model management POJOs, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rust (unofficial)
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-obsidian-plugin
summary: Obsidian.md plugin that lets you run local LLMs on your notes: summarize, rewrite, Q&A inside the editor.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript tool provider so you can call Ollama models as tools in natural-language automation scripts.

title: ollama-macos-menu-bar
summary: SwiftUI menu-bar app for macOS that starts/stops Ollama services and shows GPU usage at a glance.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.
